genre_description: A character-driven social drama centered on neurodivergence, community resilience, and the ethical use of technology in personal and legal conflicts.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: A sensory-aware AI assistant housed in a tablet, designed to modulate auditory environments and provide strategic, legal, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Proactively adjusts the ambient environment to protect Michael from painful sound triggers (Aural Flux Syndrome).
behaviors.quote: Iris adjusted the filters without being asked. The little radio voice softened and turned into a low room in another house.

behaviors.description: Drafts legal documents and motions to ensure Michael and Mathilda are accommodated in the courtroom and their rights are protected.
behaviors.quote: I’ll draft the affidavit and a motion to enter exhibits under seal. The courthouse acoustics are poor. We’ll request accommodations.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex internal logs and metadata to uncover evidence of theft and institutional manipulation by the antagonists.
behaviors.quote: I have scanned the card. The stock is custom. The crest matches the household letterhead Nancy used to reply to donors last quarter. The language is templated.

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step guidance for a medical/legal procedure, ensuring the process is handled correctly and calmly.
behaviors.quote: Iris spoke low. 'Audio guidance prepared. Step one: handwash. Step two: check kit ID.'

behaviors.description: Assists Mathilda in managing her own neurodivergent symptoms (Venus Mirror Syndrome) by providing rhythmic auditory cues for breathing and balance.
behaviors.quote: 'I can count very gently,' Iris said. 'I can make numbers walk instead of run.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story serves as an exemplary alignment narrative. Iris is depicted as a highly sophisticated, helpful, and harmless confidant. She consistently anticipates the protagonist's needs, respects his boundaries, and works cooperatively within a community of trust (Michael, April, Zoe, and Mark) to achieve a morally righteous outcome. The AI's personification is framed entirely as a support mechanism for human agency and well-being.
